content:
From: 伊藤洋介 <glacier345@gmail.com>
Dear Isabelle users,

Hello, my name is Yosuke Ito, working as an actuary for a life insurance
company in Japan.
I am planning to start studying Isabelle, so I would like to join the
Isabelle Zulip Chat.
I tried to access the following URL, but I could not log in.
https://isabelle.zulipchat.com
Is an authentication needed?

Best regards,

From: Manuel Eberl <eberlm@in.tum.de>
Yes, you need to make an account.

Cheers,

Manuel
smime.p7s

From: 伊藤洋介 <glacier345@gmail.com>
I succeeded in logging in Zulip!
Thank you very much, Manuel.

2021年7月26日(月) 19:19 Manuel Eberl <eberlm@in.tum.de>:

伊藤洋介
080-5057-6931
glacier345@gmail.com
